description: Roof extension to rear roof slope; alteration to part of main roof to increase ridge height; and provision of rear roof terrace with associated balustrades and privacy screens
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings and documents: GSA944/PL100 (Site Map and Location Plan), GSA944/EX001 (Existing Third Floor Plan), GSA944/EX002 (Existing Fourth Floor Plan), GSA944/EX003 (Existing Roof Plan), GSA944/EX004 (Existing Front Elevation), GSA944/EX005 (Existing Rear Elevation), GSA944/EX006 (Existing Side Elevation), GSA944/EX007 (Existing Section AA), GSA944/EX008 (Existing Section BB), GSA944/EX009 (Existing Section CC), GSA944/EX010 (Existing Site Photos), GSA944/PL101 (Proposed Third Floor Plan), GSA944/PL002 (Proposed Fourth Floor Plan), GSA944/PL003 (Proposed Roof Plan), GSA944/PL004 (Proposed Front Elevation), GSA944/PL005 (Proposed Rear Elevation), GSA944/PL006 (Proposed Side Elevation), GSA944/PL007 (Proposed Section AA), GSA944/PL008 (Proposed Section BB), GSA944/PL009 (Proposed Section CC), and Design and Access Statement prepared by Guy Stansfeld Architects Ltd (ref: GSA944 - PDA200).

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings and documents listed under Condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021). | The hereby approved rooflights to the flat roof and side roof slope shall be Conservation style rooflights and lie flush with the roof, and shall be retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, and to safeguard the character and appearance of the conservation area in accordance with policies D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013). | The hereby approved balustrades and privacy screens to the roof terrace shall be installed prior to the first use of the roof terrace and permanently retained thereafter.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties in accordance with policies D3 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), policies policy 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012).
